name: Russian Rollette
description:
StoryIn a cold forgotten storage hall in Russia, six people including you are playing Russian Roulette for money... the catch: at the start of every round, you roll a dice to see how many bullets you are gonna put into the chamber.... maybe even six.

Unlock many funny items to survive your journey!
If you die, don't worry, you can just play again.

No NSFW.
